text: Unmasked is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on May 20, 1980. == Track listing == *Is That You *Shandi *Talk To Me *Naked City *What Makes The World Go 'Round *Tomorrow *Two Sides Of The Coin *She's So European *Easy As It Seems *Torpedo Girl *You're All That I Want Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1980 albums Category:Pop rock albums Category:Hard rock albums
title: Unmasked
